text:
The horror is real.

But so is the healing.

You stand in the center of Tyger Tyger, and you do not run.

You faced the darkness. You looked into the void.

And you chose to be human anyway.

You may not save everyone. The missing may never be found.

But you saved yourself.

And that's a start.

You stay in town. Someone has to bear witness.

Someone has to remember.

Someone has to stand against the Tyger.

And today, that someone is you.

The dawn breaks over Tyger Tyger.

And you're still here.
